attributes.action: Have the Rt. Honorable Matt Hancock, appear as the next James Bond.
attributes.additional_details: Because the man kicks the rona's butt and would provide hope for all challenged individuals wanting to succeed.
attributes.background: I would like Parliament to discuss the possibility of asking Matt Hancock to save our nation and follow in the footsteps of Daniel Craig to play James Bond on the big screen

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions for things the Government or House of Commons is directly responsible for.

Deciding who will play the next James Bond is a matter for Eon Productions, which produces the Bond films, not the Government or House of Commons.
